description: From fore- +‎ sail. Compare Dutch voorzeil, German Vorsegel, Danish forsejl, Swedish försegel.

entries.meaning: (nautical, on a square-rigged ship) The lowest (and usually the largest) square sail hung on the foremast
(nautical) A square fore-and-aft sail set on the foremast, but behind it, on a schooner or other similar vessel.
(nautical, on a sloop) A triangular sail set forward of the foremast: forestaysail.
